Name: NinjaVillage
Description: This is an e-commerce application inspired by the popular e-commerce site Amazon. Users can search, sell, purchase, and review products.

Name: Buzz
Description: This is a spin-off of the popular business messaging application Slack. Users on Slack can share messages, images, setup communication channels for group collaboration, and take part in audio sessions within their organizations.

Name: AwayRental
Description: A clone of the popular hosting site AirBnB. Users on AirBnB are able to offer their property to host overnight stays, stay at other places that other users have hosted.
